modName: Improved Weapon Impact EFFECTS Correct Metal
summary: Just A small mod to change that annoying dust to metal sparkles for all weapons hit on other
descriptionHtml:
[size=36][color=Purple][u]Fitting Effects[/u][/color][/size]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured.png[/img][/url][/center]

Just A small mod to change that annoying dust to metal sparkles for all weapons hit, on other
it annoyed me that everytime i missed my hit or if i hitted some glass the only impact was dust comming of so i thought to replace the dust with metal sparkles.

V1.1 including
.ESP (Cleaned by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/425937]RPSGC[/url]) Thx ;)
and some pics

V1.0 including
.ESP
and some Pics

Srry bad englis

if you liked this don\'t forget to endorse and comment ;)
